00036 lbann::DataReader_CIFAR10::DataReader_CIFAR10(const EGrid& grid, int batchSize)

00048 bool lbann::DataReader_CIFAR10::load(string FileDir, string FileName)
00049 {
00050 #if 0
00051         this->free();
00052         
00053         string trainfiles[5] = { "data_batch_1.bin", "data_batch_2.bin",
00054                 "data_batch_3.bin", "data_batch_4.bin", "data_batch_5.bin"};
00055         string testfile = "test_batch.bin";
00056         int imgsize = 1 + ImageWidth * ImageHeight * 3;
00057 
00058         // read training data
00059         for (int n = 0; n < 5; n++) {
00060                 string trainpath = string(DatasetDir) + __DIR_DELIMITER + trainfiles[n];
00061                 FILE* fptrain = fopen(trainpath.c_str(), "rb");
00062                 if (!fptrain)
00063                         return false;
00064                 
00065                 for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
00066                         unsigned char* data = new unsigned char[imgsize];
00067                         fread(data, imgsize, 1, fptrain);
00068                         TrainData.push_back(data);
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 fclose(fptrain);
00072         }
00073         
00074         // read testing data
00075         string testpath = string(DatasetDir) + __DIR_DELIMITER + testfile;
00076         FILE* fptest = fopen(testpath.c_str(), "rb");
00077         if (!fptest)
00078                 return false;
00079         
00080         for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
00081                 unsigned char* data = new unsigned char[imgsize];
00082                 fread(data, imgsize, 1, fptest);
00083                 TestData.push_back(data);
00084         }
00085         
00086     return true;
00087 #endif  
00088 }
